column2: mutate(specialization = rowMeans(.[, c('tms_special_1', 'tms_special_2', "tms_special_3", "tms_special_4", "tms_special_5")]), credibility = rowMeans(.[, c('tms_credib_1', 'tms_credib_2', "tms_credib_3", "tms_credib_4", "tms_credib_5")]), coordination = rowMeans(.[, c('tms_coord_1', 'tms_coord_2', "tms_coord_3", "tms_coord_4", "tms_coord_5")]))
